summary: Completed comprehensive testing of GameHub marketplace MVP. Backend APIs 100% functional (32/32 tests passed). Frontend core functionality working with minor product display issues in catalog.

ui_bugs.issue: Products grid shows 0 products even when products exist in database
ui_bugs.details: Backend APIs return products correctly, but frontend grid displays empty. Search functionality also affected.

passed_tests: All 32 backend API endpoints working correctly
Homepage with hero section, categories, featured products
Admin panel with stats and management tables
Product detail pages with cart/favorites functionality
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix product display issue in catalog page - products exist in backend but not showing in frontend grid. Check GameCard component rendering and product data mapping in CatalogPage.js
